DOC.brief_summary: The ACHIEVE study is a single-arm, open-label, prospective, post-market follow-up study to include up to one hundred (100) eligible patients as defined within the clinical investigational plan, with a twelve month follow-up period. The ACHIEVE study was originally designed in accordance with the 2007 ESH ESC guidelines for resistant hypertension.
